channel.title: Sites on About Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Sites on About Hugo

item.title: Showtime Website
item.description:
The IMI Showtime Website was created during the pandemic to replace the Showtime Fair.

Now, as the showtime is back to it’s original format, it will will be continued to supplement the showtime as event home page and project archive.

item.title: about-hugo.github.io
item.description: This site. This Web Site is also build with hugo, using the whisper theme.

item.title: Queer HTW
item.description: Little Site for the HTW Queer Employees Network based on theme-console.

item.title: bkleinen.github.io
item.description:
My HTW Homepage contains all information about my classes and other HTW related stuff. I’ve created an own theme based on bootstrap for it.

It contains more than 10 years of history, see https://home.htw-berlin.de/~kleinen/classes/.
